title: Hanaukyo Maid Team: La Verite
overview:
After his mother passes away, Taro Hanaukyo is invited to his 
grandfather's home. There, he meets a beautiful maid named Mariel and 
finds out that his grandfather has retired to a remote island and has 
given him ownership of his estate. Taro also discovers that not only is 
the estate a colossal mansion, it has hundreds of gorgeous maids ready 
to serve him 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
